name: Fruit Drop Bubble
description:
Fruit Drop Bubble is the most classic and amazing fruits shooting bubble buster game,is the most classic and new bubble pop shooter fruits games
Features:
- Puzzle Mode - 650+ of fruit puzzling saga levels!
- Arcade Mode - The bubbles will go down gradually so you need to shoot quickly to avoid death
- Very cute bubble fruit splash graphics, Animated, fruit break sound effects.
- Easy to play but hard to master. Can you get 3 stars on each level?
